name: 2017_04_humanities_student_major_2060_wwu
title: 2017-04-humanities-student-major_2060_WWU.txt
content_scrubbed:
Hi everyone! My name is Lizzie, I am a Student Admissions Representative (StAR) for the Office of Admissions and I will be answering your questions! 

First off a little about myself:

I am a second year student at WWU and I am studying Business Administration with an emphasis in Marketing and minoring in User Experience Design. I work for Admissions as a StAR and as the social media assistant! (Shameless promo: add us on snapchat @wwuadmissions and follow us on Twitter @wwuadmit). I was just selected to be the VP of Digital Marketing and Web Design for the Student Marketing Association (SMA). When I am not in class or working I spend a lot of my time trying new restaurants in Bellingham, hanging out with my friends, or going up to Vancouver, Canada! I am originally from Kirkland, WA (about an hour and fifteen minutes south). I picked Western because I wanted to go to a mid-sized liberal_arts school and WWU was just far enough away to where my parents don't come visit every weekend but just close enough to where I can go home and bug my 16 year old sister if I need to. 
 
I am really looking forward to answering all your questions! This AMA is supposed to be geared towards prospective students and is being put on by the Office of Admissions so I may not have every answer, but for all the questions I don't have answers to I will do my best to find an answer!
